name: Bruce's Trek Through Time
description:
Bruce is a police officer who recently lost his partner to the hands of the infamous gangster, Necro. While hunting Necro down, something...inexplicable happened.

Turn-based combat with options for targeting. Shoot at an enemy's body for a higher probability of a hit, target the leg to slow them down, or target the eyes for a risky, but potentially devastating shot.

I started this over Christmas break as a fun side project. There are only a few levels right now, but if there is enough interest I will continue to add more when I have time. Who can guess the inspiration for the story? For the combat?

CONTROLS

Right-click and drag to pan the view. 

Middle-click and drag to rotate the view.

Hover over an enemy and left-click a body part to fire. You only have so many action points on your turn so use them wisely. Also, if you equip a different weapon during combat that will cost you five action points.
